snippet: Tyler Johnson has given all his spectacular right arm can take to get his little baseball program from Long Island to within one victory of its first College World Series.
abstract: Stony Brook defeats host Louisiana State, 3-1, to even their NCAA super-regional baseball series at one game each; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Johnson has given all his spectacular right arm can take to get his little baseball program from Long Island to within one victory of its first College World Series.

headline.seo: Stony Brook Evens N.C.A.A. Super-Regional Series
